content: I want to debug/write a test for a macro_rules! macro originally sourced from rustc that breaks RA's macro analysis. Where can I put such a test? It seems to parse ok, but causes a macro-error, so the harnessing on the syntax crate wouldn't work for it.
You mean MBE expansion test? They are in crates/mbe/src/tests/expand.rs
hm. upon some manual "bisection" I realized I simply rediscovered https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/8092 :laughing: oops. ty for the help!
